name: VK-00M3
description:
Beta build. It only has one battle, but the main mechanics are complete. Sound effects are not entirely there.

Concept Art/Sprites: Main Character

Real Name: REDACTED

Code Name: VK-00M3

Backstory: After a lifetime of experimentation, VK-00M3 has been thrown into the lower streets. All she needs right now is revenge against those who've wronged her. And she will not stop, no matter who stands in her way.
